/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtMnuGrpBDao.selectPtMnuGrpB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'MNU_GRP_MD_CD' AND CD = M.MNU_GRP_MD_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_GRP_MD_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'MNU_GRP_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.MNU_GRP_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_GRP_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'PLT_LOUT_CD' AND CD = M.PLT_LOUT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) PLT_LOUT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.MNU_GRP_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.MNU_GRP_ID, T.MNU_GRP_MD_CD, T.MNU_GRP_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.SYSG_YN, T.MNU_GRP_TYP_CD, T.SORT_ORDR, T.MNU_URL, T.POP_SETUP_CONT, T.PLT_LOUT_CD, T.OPEN_COMP_ID, T.MD_RID, T.USE_YN, T.REGR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.REG_DT, 120) REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.MOD_DT, 120) MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'MNU_GRP_MD_CD' AND CD = T.MNU_GRP_MD_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_GRP_MD_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'MNU_GRP_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.MNU_GRP_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_GRP_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'PLT_LOUT_CD' AND CD = T.PLT_LOUT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) PLT_LOUT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM PT_MNU_GRP_B T, PT_RESC_B R
AND R.LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko') AND R.RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND R.RESC_VA LIKE '%'+#{schWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'%' AND T.MNU_GRP_ID = #{mnuGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MNU_GRP_MD_CD = #{mnuGrpMdCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.SYSG_YN = #{sysgYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.OPEN_COMP_ID = #{openCompId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.OPEN_COMP_ID IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.MNU_GRP_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
